title: Two men arrested in New York City with bomb-making material - New York Times
text: February 16, 2018 / 12:16 AM / Updated 32 minutes ago Two men arrested in New York City with bomb-making material - New York Times Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Authorities arrested two people in New York City on Thursday and planned to charge to them with building an explosive device after what they described a federal terrorism investigation, the New York Times reported, citing an unnamed law enforcement official. Federal charges were being prepared against the two, who were arrested in the cityâ€™s Bronx borough and were in possession of materials to build such a device, the official was quoted as saying. An 8 p.m. (0100 GMT on Friday) news conference was scheduled with the police and Federal Bureau of Investigation. Reporting by Chris Kenning; Editing by Sandra Maler
